        public void update(GameMap gameMap,
                   int row,
                   int col)
        Function responsible for updating the ogre position in the given map, to the position (row, col). The position of the ogre is dependent of gameMap characteristics.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        gameMap - Map used for updating ogre position
        row - row of the Matrix to be updated
        col - Col of the Matrix to be updated
